name: Miracle Organization towards Health and Education Remedial Society
briefDescription: MOTHER SOCIETY is a Non-Profit Voluntary Organization. Registered under Societies Registration Act 35 of 2001, in the year 2005. Its registration number is 647/2005. And also registered under Foreign Contribution Regulation Act(FCRA),1976 Vide Red No.010270236 and also registered under 12 A Income Tax Act 1961.Our Organization is formed with the group of seven likeminded people who are having passion in social service, it intends to take up social, economic, health, educational, vocational training, livelihoods, rural development for empowerment of disadvantaged & vulnerable sections of the society particularly of women, children and youth. We believe in strengthening of disadvantaged & vulnerable sections for equity, justice & peace.
